author: bachtis
body: This tunes PF assuming method II is the default and it applies timing cuts. One can choose to tune PF for method I or use Method1.5 [regardless of the HCAL reco used] using the customization functions in RecoParticleFLow.PFProducer.tools.pfClusteringCustoms
title: Default HCAL reco in 73X -> replaces #5882
